divs: Sighting DetailsI do not speak English, I'm going through Google translator. We were in the house, facing the mountain because some people had told us they had UFO sightings in those days, when we saw a light slowly down the mountain (the mountain is called "Pe���a de Juaica") came to the mountain quad , we saw it "off." This happened a few nights. Another night we saw a UFO fell rapidly changed color to fall, and is "switched off" before hitting the mountain, after this we saw another UFO traversed the sky at an average speed, this was a light incadesente of yellow color. This happened in December 2010. Other sightings have been in place for the village community. We react with surprise, we could not believe it, we began to earch for a logical explanation, a child began to mourn and cry, but then we calmed down and everything returned to normal. When this writer was a light lit up my room for two or three seconds ... I'm a little scared and a
Summary: Some light was flying to go to the mountain, here it was turn off. This happen some nigths.
